name: meteor-auth0-lock
description: Use the Auth0 lock widget to log into a meteor app from another origin (e.g. landing page)

scripts.sandbox: rm -r lib && parcel build src/index.js -d sandbox --target browser --no-source-maps
scripts.build: rm -r lib && parcel build src/index.js -d lib --target browser --no-source-maps
